title: The passengers must obtain real identification permits for the driver by October 2020
subtitle: Some passengers may not be able to use their driver ' s licences to board aircraft after 1 October 2020 because of the Act on True Identity.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Some passengers may not be able to use their driver ' s licences to board aircraft after 1 October 2020 because of the Act on True Identity.
